messages.text: I’m not sure what courses to take next semester. Can you help?
Of course! Have you already spoken to your academic advisor?
No problem! You can schedule an appointment through TerpEngage or explore your major’s course requirements online. Would you like the link to TerpEngage or the course catalog?
Yes, the course catalog link, please.
Here’s the link to the UMD course catalog: [Course Catalog](https://www.umd.edu/catalog).
